LOSSLESS_TRAFFIC_PATTERN_INVALID_NAME_TE.desc: Configure LOSSLESS_TRAFFIC_PATTERN table with invalid character.
LOSSLESS_TRAFFIC_PATTERN_INVALID_NAME_TE.eStr: Invalid lossless traffic pattern list name.

LOSSLESS_TRAFFIC_PATTERN_TOO_LONG_NAME_T.eStr: Invalid length for the lossless traffic pattern list name.

LOSSLESS_TRAFFIC_PATTERN_TOO_SMALL_MTU_T.desc: Configure LOSSLESS_TRAFFIC_PATTERN table with an MTU exceeding the lowerbound.
LOSSLESS_TRAFFIC_PATTERN_TOO_SMALL_MTU_T.eStr: Invaild MTU which should be in [1, 9216].

LOSSLESS_TRAFFIC_PATTERN_TOO_LARGE_MTU_T.desc: Configure LOSSLESS_TRAFFIC_PATTERN table with an MTU exceeding the upperbound.
LOSSLESS_TRAFFIC_PATTERN_TOO_LARGE_MTU_T.eStr: Invaild MTU which should be in [1, 9216].

LOSSLESS_TRAFFIC_PATTERN_TOO_LARGE_SMALL.desc: Configure LOSSLESS_TRAFFIC_PATTERN table with a small packet percentage exceeding the upperbound.
